Text: Hmm I don't know why people keep talking about a crack, this game is old enough... I never had to use any crack for it.As far as I know there are two verions(the cd version and the gog version) for the cd version you just install the game. it doesn't even ask for serial key!! same is for gog version that u can find here http://www.gog.com/gamecard/praetorians and is also updated to 1.04 patch

Though latest patch is 1.05 and can be found here http://downloads.tafn.info/files.php?cat=13 Anyone willing to upload and seed the gog version (which works for all windows) would be much appreciated...
